articles.title: Apple confirms the iPhone 16 has 8GB of RAM to power Apple Intelligence - The Verge
articles.description: In an interview, Apple’s senior VP of hardware technologies confirmed that the iPhone 16 lineup has 8GB of RAM in order to support AI features in the iPhone.
articles.content:
Apple confirms the iPhone 16 has 8GB of RAM

articles.title: Huawei outshines Apple with Mate XT, upstaging iPhone 16 launch - TechHQ

articles.content:
